mapper.insert: INSERT INTO daily_report (working_date, working_start_time, working_end_time, working_contents, shomu_sonota, shokan , id) VALUES (#{workingDate},#{workingStartTime}, #{workingEndTime}, #{workingContents}, #{workingSonota}, #{shokan}, #{id})
mapper.select: SELECT working_start_time, working_end_time FROM daily_report WHERE working_date = CURDATE() AND id = #{id}
SELECT working_date FROM daily_report WHERE working_date = #{workingDate} AND id = #{id}
